## ControlGroupComponent interface

Represents a control group component used to display a group of controls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ControlGroupComponent<TValueType extends object, TViewOptions extends object> extends ControlComponent<TValueType, TViewOptions> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ControlComponent](./dynamic-forms.controlcomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;TValueType, TViewOptions&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [controls](./dynamic-forms.controlgroupcomponent.controls.md) | Immutable&lt;[DynamicControlMap](./dynamic-forms.dynamiccontrolmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, any&gt;&gt; | The controls of the form group |
|  [formControl](./dynamic-forms.controlgroupcomponent.formcontrol.md) | FormGroup | The form group control accociated with the component |
